JPScore

Core module for simulation and computing of trajectories.

The core module for performing the simulation (i.e. computing the trajectories). See the online documentation

Get the source code

  • The project is being developed in a Gitlab repository.
  • Our GitHub repository is used to host selected tags and releases.

So, get the code from Gitlab and the releases from GitHub. :-)
